entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then partly cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 30 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
